text: James Richard "Jim" Leyland (born December 15, 1944) was a baseball manager. He managed the Pittsburgh Pirates, Florida Marlins, Colorado Rockies, and Detroit Tigers. He won the World Series with the Marlins in 1997. He retired after the 2013 season. ==Other websites== * Managerial record at Baseball- Reference.com Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Detroit Tigers managers Category:Miami Marlins Category:Pittsburgh Pirates managers Category:Colorado Rockies
title: Jim Leyland
